Text: Re cocktails tonightSorry I missed you girls this weekend Had a crawfish boilbirthday party to go to I am sure I made up for your cocktails if you were not able to make it Hope to see you all soon Ashley wrote Hello everyone I am in town and am meeting Susan E Katy and maybe Laura at Papadeaux around on for cocktails and appetizers If anyone is interested in joining us we would love to see you Ill have my cell phone with me today or you can call me at my parents house if you need to Hope to see you there Kelly Do You Yahoo Try FREE Yahoo Mail the worlds greatest free email
